titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a free trade agreement with Egypt.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a free trade agreement with Egypt.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a free trade agreement with Egypt.
